name: Tropical Crush
description:
You will love this game. Have fun by matching the juicy fruits while enjoying the tropical sounds and sceneries, over 100 levels of tropical action and adventure where you will have to make your best moves to achieve the "CRUSH" and complete all objectives in each level. Use the helpers to complete the levels. It starts simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging, so be prepared, we know you was looking this game ... Here it is, Free and fully in Spanish.

Tropical Crush features:
• More than 100 levels and different objectives to complete.
• Game is fully in Spanish. This game is also available in English (Tropical Crush).
• Juicy ways to play on each level (by time, by movements, beat the score, unlock the blocks, free fruit and more).
• Juicy tropical fruits, special fruits, fruity bombs and several other tropical surprises to help you complete the levels.
• Share your score and your progress with your friends on Facebook.
• Sounds and tropical pictures… Feel the sun, feel the Tropical Crush… you'll love this game.
